author: cms-nanoAOD
body:
Second set of NanoAOD updates: e/gamma smearing, Fall17 photon id, LHE particles, updated b-jet regression (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/3887)
This is the master PR corresponding to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/22753
title: NanoAOD for MiniAODv2 - part 2, e/gamma (master)
